TopicTitle: downloading and sharing spacecraft for Xbox and PS4

Articles.Content:
I think users should be able to share and download spacecraft for the two consoles, but I am not sure how that feature would be added because I do not know any downloading app for the two consoles.

Edited September 5, 2016 by Fearless leader
It was also a suggestion, so I needed to edit it.

Got to admit, it almost seems aburd that the console versions don't have the file-sharing benefits of the PC version.

Edited September 6, 2016 by Columbia
I don't have a modern console, how is content typically shared on them?
